mapper.select: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS PLAYER CASCADE;

CREATE TABLE PLAYER( PLAYER_ID serial PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, TEAM_ID INT NOT NULL REFERENCES TEAM(TEAM_ID), UNIFORM_NUM INT NOT NULL, FIRST_NAME TEXT NOT NULL, LAST_NAME TEXT NOT NULL, MPG INT, PPG INT, RPG INT, APG INT, SPG decimal(10,1), BPG decimal(10,1));
mapper.insert: insert into PLAYER (TEAM_ID, UNIFORM_NUM, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, MPG, PPG, RPG, APG, SPG, BPG) values(#{team_id}, #{uniform_num}, #{first_name}, #{last_name}, #{mpg}, #{ppg}, #{rpg}, #{apg}, #{spg}, #{bpg})
